wordGroup: obstacle course n. 超越障碍训练场

sentences.en: Overcrowding remains a large obstacle to improving conditions.
sentences.cn: 过度拥挤仍然是改善条件的一大障碍。

sentences.en: A lack of qualifications can be a major obstacle to finding a job.
sentences.cn: 学历不足可能成为谋职的主要障碍。

sentences.en: Most competition cars will only roll over if they hit an obstacle.
sentences.cn: 多数赛车在撞到障碍物时都会翻车。
